comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
I am closing this as there is existing support for a similar feature.

 - `SKPicture` - when the document is loaded, there is the `Picture` property.
 - `SKBitmap`, `SKImage` - after the document is loaded, you can use the `SKImage.FromPicture` method ([docs](https://developer.xamarin.com/api/member/SkiaSharp.SKImage.FromPicture/p/SkiaSharp.SKPicture/SkiaSharp.SKSizeI))
